name: part_005
file: tmp_【 ＃百鬼あやめ生誕祭2024】Dream Festival‼ ～Nakiriayame 7th BirthDay～【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [d4l17lJKhDE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame and Usada Pekora perform a song together, including a brief interactive MC segment.
Transition scene featuring balloons, confetti, and images of Hololive members.
Nakiri Ayame, Yukihana Lamy, Nekomata Okayu, and Shirogane Noel perform 'Kyarurin Shite Mite'.

subtitles.original: 笑顔見せてなんのその
subtitles.english: No matter what, show your smile

subtitles.original: まだまだあれこんなもん
subtitles.english: There's still more, this is nothing

subtitles.original: 大成功しちゃうもんね
subtitles.english: We're going to be a huge success

subtitles.original: 飛べ 飛べ もうちょっとで届く
subtitles.english: Fly, fly, we'll reach it in just a bit

subtitles.original: 行け 行け もうちょっとで変わる
subtitles.english: Go, go, it'll change in just a bit

subtitles.original: 君と私
subtitles.english: You and I

subtitles.original: 一緒だったら
subtitles.english: If we're together

subtitles.original: 心配なんてなくなっちゃうと
subtitles.english: Worries will disappear

subtitles.original: 小さいこと気にしません
subtitles.english: I won't sweat the small stuff

subtitles.original: 質問！
subtitles.english: Question!

subtitles.original: あなたが鬼退治を任されたらどう戦いますか？
subtitles.english: If you were tasked with oni slaying, how would you fight?

subtitles.original: りゃー！ そりゃー！
subtitles.english: Ryaa! Soryaa!

subtitles.original: はい！ 鬼ヶ島に遊園地と温泉とサウナを作って
subtitles.english: Yes! I'll build an amusement park, a hot spring, and a sauna on Onigashima...

subtitles.original: 毒気を抜いて平和的解決を図ります！
subtitles.english: ...to drain their malice and seek a peaceful resolution!

subtitles.original: でもね たまに赤点取る日もあるよ
subtitles.english: But you know, there are days when we fail too

subtitles.original: そう うちら人間なんだもん
subtitles.english: That's right, because we're only human

subtitles.original: さあ お団子食べに行きますか
subtitles.english: Come on, shall we go eat some dango?

subtitles.original: 諦めるなんて言葉
subtitles.english: The word "giving up"...

subtitles.original: 絶対にないよ
subtitles.english: ...is definitely not in our vocabulary

subtitles.original: ドンと来いだよ
subtitles.english: Bring it on

subtitles.original: ハンデ有りのノンフィクション
subtitles.english: Non-fiction with a handicap

subtitles.original: いま いま この瞬間が
subtitles.english: Now, now, this very moment

subtitles.original: スタート切るチャンスなんだ
subtitles.english: Is the chance to make a start

subtitles.original: ドンと来いだよ
subtitles.english: Bring it on

subtitles.original: 気合い入れてこんちくしょう
subtitles.english: Let's fire ourselves up, damn it

subtitles.original: ほら ほら もうあっというま
subtitles.english: Look, look, in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: 大逆転しちゃうもんね
subtitles.english: We're going to turn things around

subtitles.original: 飛べ 飛べ もうちょいだけ高く
subtitles.english: Fly, fly, just a little bit higher

subtitles.original: 行け 行け もうちょいだけ遠く
subtitles.english: Go, go, just a little bit further

subtitles.original: 君と私
subtitles.english: You and I

subtitles.original: 本気出せば
subtitles.english: If we give it our all

subtitles.original: 限界なんてちょいちょいちょいね
subtitles.english: Limits are easy to overcome

subtitles.original: フレフレ！ 私たちへ
subtitles.english: Go, go! To us

subtitles.original: フレフレ！ みんなへ
subtitles.english: Go, go! To everyone

subtitles.original: フレフレ！ インフレだって強く生きましょ
subtitles.english: Go, go! Let's live strong even through inflation

subtitles.original: フレフレ！ 私たちへ
subtitles.english: Go, go! To us

subtitles.original: フレフレ！ みんなへ
subtitles.english: Go, go! To everyone
